configuration.name: widget_07013686513116526
configuration.title: Discuss
configuration.stem: Which of the offspring resemble the parent and which do not? With a partner discuss the ways the parents and offspring are similar and the ways they are different.
configuration.teacherAnswer: Student should notice that the offspring of the ray and cactus look like smaller versions of the parent. The offspring of the luna moth and the frog have different body shapes and features than the parent.
